name: AKKA Technologies
bossPosition: Chairman of the Board and Group CEO
membership:

goal: AKKA Technologies is an engineering and technology consulting company with 21 centers of excellence across Europe, Africa, Middle-East, Asia and the Americas. As a European leader in the mobility segment with more than 16,500 skilled employees and an in-house research center, AKKA Research, it supports its clients with a wide-range of global services for industrial projects and the ability to collaborate across the entire product lifecycle.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
